title: Crime Alert 05.24.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 05.24.19
description:
A Vermont truck driver convicted in deaths of five teens in a wrong-way crash. A New Jersey couple’s 4-month-old dies during a “time out.” An Atlanta 2-year-old rescued from a scorching hot car in a Walmart parking lot.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
